bpp/descriptor.name: Adya
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Adya is a universal open-source platform for commerce and supply chain. With its Platform-as-a-Service and integration-Platform-as-a-service capabilities, Siva is a truly interoperable solution, with more than 100 ready-made solutions at the door.

descriptor.name: Freshspot
descriptor.short_desc: Indulging in flavors that make life delicious.
descriptor.long_desc: Indulging in flavors that make life delicious.

descriptor.name: Mazedar Makhni Paneer
descriptor.long_desc: A treat for all makhni lovers. Spiced paneer, onion, juicy red bell peppers with our new flavourful makhni sauce, topped with 100% mozzarella cheese and buttery spice sprinkle

descriptor.name: A treat for all makhni lovers. Spiced paneer, onion, juicy red bell peppers with our new flavourful makhni sauce, topped with 100% mozzarella cheese and buttery spice sprinkle
descriptor.long_desc: Loaded with our signature spicy schezwan sauce, juicy schezwan chicken meatballs & 100% mozzarella cheese.

descriptor.name: Tandoori Paneer Grilled Sandwich
descriptor.long_desc: Served with fries and coleslaw. A house speciality for paneer lovers.
